original_title: Online Safety Act gazetted under Ministry of Public Security
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); An extraordinary gazette notification has been issued including the Online Safety Act under the scope of the Ministry of Public Security.
The gazette notification states the Online Safety Act has been included under the scope of the Ministry of Public Security with effect from the 7th of February, 2024.
